槪字的基本解释

槪
gài
同“概”。

槪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gài］
“概1”的旧字形。

槪字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页547第07
同槩。　又【韻會】尊名。【周禮·春官·鬯人】凡祼事用槪。凡疈事用散。【註】皆桼尊也。有朱帶者曰槪，無飾曰散。　又與漑通。【周禮·春官·大宗伯·眡滌濯註】漑，祭器也。本或作槪。槪，拭也。　又【集韻】巨列切，音竭。杙也。亦省作楬。

槪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
槪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
槪
gài

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gài］

槪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槪; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 547 07
The same.　[Yunhui] Honorable name. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Shanren】Used for everything. Use loose for all carbuncle. [Note] All Jie Zun also. Those with a Zhu belt say 槪, and those without ornaments say San.　 and Tong Tong again. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Da Zongbo·Hang Diluo's Note】The sacrificial vessel is also used. This or make it. Hey, wipe it.　[Jiyun] Huge column cut, sound exhaustion. Yeah. Also the province is made.
